title: David Cole Interviews Dr. Franciszek Piper (1992)
description: David Cole Interviews Dr. Franciszek Piper (1992).mp4 - 1h 4min 320 x 240 Filmed on location at the Auschwitz camp site in Poland, this stunning video by Jewish-American investigator David Cole shows that the "gas chamber" that has been displayed to hundreds of thousands of tourists is actually a propaganda prop. Alicia, an official tour guide, assures David Cole, on camera, that the "gas chamber" in the main camp that is shown to visitors is in its original, unaltered state. Then Dr. Franciszek Piper, head curator of the Auschwitz State Museum, acknowledges to Cole that this "gas chamber" is actually a postwar creation. This video also tackles other Holocaust claims, including the "human soap" fable. This video affirms what French scholar Dr. Robert Faurisson had already established, and what Holocaust skeptics had maintained for years: that fraudulent "proofs" of homicidal gassings were produced after the end of World War II, and that visitors to the Auschwitz camp site have been systematically deceived for decades. British historian David Irving was fined 10,000 marks by a German court, and banned from Germany, for having said what Dr. Piper casually acknowledges here. Defenders of the orthodox Holocaust story were understandably rattled by this video. Jewish groups sought to ban newspaper advertisements for it. Prof. Yehuda Bauer, a prominent Israeli Holocaust specialist, called it "a powerful and dangerous video." Please share this information far and wide, burn the video to DVDs or put it on USB thumbdrives and give them out to friends, family and others. Please seed as long as possible, at least to a ratio of 1.100, thank you :) General : David Cole Interviews Dr. Franciszek Piper.mp4 Format : MPEG-4 at 366 kb/s Length : 168 MiB for 1 h 4 min 14 s 258 ms Video #0 : AVC at 235 kb/s Aspect : 320 x 240 (1.333) at 25.000 fps Audio #0 : AAC at 126 kb/s Infos : 2 channels, 44.1 kHz Screens: https://s19.postimg.cc/hde2atk0z/vlcsnap-2018-07-14-01h40m10s127.png https://s19.postimg.cc/i2wun6sab/vlcsnap-2018-07-14-01h40m21s531.png https://s19.postimg.cc/8id80bidv/vlcsnap-2018-07-14-01h40m28s536.png https://s19.postimg.cc/oglxqeulf/vlcsnap-2018-07-14-01h41m11s743.png https://s19.postimg.cc/h0mo4melv/vlcsnap-2018-07-14-01h41m57s938.png https://s19.postimg.cc/rap33vjwz/vlcsnap-2018-07-14-01h42m11s210.png
